subject: Baseball
All Star Games
lead_paragraph: The total number cast, 420 million, far exceeded the record of 391 million set in 2012, but the craziness continued as Royals players held down seven of the nine spots on the American League team.
snippet: The total number cast, 420 million, far exceeded the record of 391 million set in 2012, but the craziness continued as Royals players held down seven of the nine spots on the American League team.
